Capydocs Themes

Static gallery ready for Cloudflare Pages to list every custom theme from this repository.

Each folder inside /themes ships a theme.json manifest that Capydocs can ingest to register a custom theme. Eleventy scans those folders to build both this gallery and the machine-friendly endpoint /themes.json, perfect for deployment automation.
